title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
Introducing the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This set includes five amazing vehicles: Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. These cars are made with durable Batcast Metal diecast material and have working wheels for realistic play. 

These toy cars are the perfect size with a scale of 1:55, making them easy to hold and maneuver for little hands. They are compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately and subject to availability), allowing your little ones to create their own thrilling adventures.

Recommended for children ages 3 years and older, these toy cars encourage imaginative play and storytelling. Watch as your child engages in Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action, creating epic battles and exciting races. 

Give your child hours of fun and entertainment with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack. Get ready to rev up their imaginations and let the racing adventures begin!

These toy cars are the perfect size with a 1:55 scale, making them easy to hold and play with. They are designed for children aged 3 years and older, so they are safe and suitable for little ones.

The Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack is compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately and subject to availability). With this playset, your child can create thrilling racing and launching adventures.

These toy cars encourage imaginative play and storytelling, allowing your child to create their own Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action. Let their creativity soar as they race these iconic vehicles!

Don't miss out on this exciting toy car set. Get the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack today and let the fun begin!
